plot: A disillusioned rapper travels to Japan to shoot a video and encounters a mysterious Japanese woman who leads him on a spiritual journey.
title: Broken Rhyme
plot_es: A disillusioned rapper travels to Japan to shoot a video and encounters a mysterious Japanese woman who leads him on a spiritual journey.
plot_en: A disillusioned rapper travels to Japan to shoot a video and encounters a mysterious Japanese woman who leads him on a spiritual journey.
